title: Authors and Citation
text: Moon, M.J. (2022). mcdus: US Mortality Multiple Cause Files Reader. R package version 0.1.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {mcdus: US Mortality Multiple Cause Files Reader},   author = {Michael Jongho Moon},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.1.0}, }

what: US Mortality Multiple Cause Files Reader
title: US Mortality Multiple Cause Files Reader
text: goal mcdus provide easy reproducible access U.S. Mortality Multiple Cause Files available US National Center Health Statistic’s Vital Statistics Online Data Portal. Currently, data files 1999 2020 avaialble download using package covering years since adopting ICD-10. Read US National Center Health Statistic’s Vital Statistics Data Release Policy Data User Agreement use.

title: US Mortality Multiple Cause Files Reader
text: can install development version mcdus GitHub :

title: US Mortality Multiple Cause Files Reader
text: functions allow download zip files, uncompress ASCII data files, parse R data frame object. check data specification, can open source documentation online package.
code: library(mcdus) download_mcdus_zip("2019") uncompress_mcdus_zip("2019") mcd2019 <- parse_mcdus("2019")[[1]] open_mcdus_documentation("2019")

title: Download zip files. — download_mcdus_zip
text: Download Mortality Multiple Cause Files .zip format (National Center Health Statistics 2022) .

title: Download zip files. — download_mcdus_zip
Download zip files. — download_mcdus_zip
text: years character vector years download. save_to_wd (optional) TRUE, save working directory. timeout (optional) Download timeout per file seconds.

title: Download zip files. — download_mcdus_zip
text: TRUE downloads successful, FALSE otherwise.

title: Uncompress downloaded zip files. — uncompress_mcdus_zip
text: Uncompress downloaded Mortality Multiple Cause Files .zip format (National Center Health Statistics 2022) .

title: Uncompress downloaded zip files. — uncompress_mcdus_zip
code: uncompress_mcdus_zip(   years = NULL,   save_to_wd = FALSE,   read_from_wd = FALSE,   unzip_method = "unzip" )

title: Uncompress downloaded zip files. — uncompress_mcdus_zip
text: years (optional) character vector years uncompress. Uncompress downloaded zip files NULL (default). save_to_wd (optional) TRUE, uncompress working directory. read_from_wd (optional) TRUE, downloaded zip files loaded working directory. unzip_method (optional) method unzip. See ?unzip.

title: Uncompress downloaded zip files. — uncompress_mcdus_zip
text: TRUE files successfully uncompressed, FALSE otherwise.

title: Uncompress downloaded zip files. — uncompress_mcdus_zip
